Uses of Interface
fr.upmc.components.interfaces.TwoWayI

  • Packages that use TwoWayI 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components.connectors
    Hierarchy of connector objects to assemble components.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge
    Component and port for gauges The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge provides a gauge component used to display value read from a sensor.
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces
    Types of offered and required interfaces for components.
    fr.upmc.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.

    • Uses of TwoWayI in fr.upmc.components.connectors

      Subinterfaces of TwoWayI in fr.upmc.components.connectors 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataTwoWayConnectorI
      The interface DataTwoWayConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components that exchange data rather than calling services from each others, but using the same interface on both sides and act as peers in the exchange.
      interface  TwoWayConnectorI
      The interface TwoWayConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between components exposing two-way interfaces.
      Classes in fr.upmc.components.connectors that implement TwoWayI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDataTwoWayConnector
      The class AbstractDataTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic data connector between components exchanging data in a peer to peer way rather than calling each others services.
      class  AbstractTwoWayConnector
      The class AbstractTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic connector between components calling each others services in a peer to peer way rather than in a client-provider relationship.
      class  DataTwoWayConnector
      The class DataTwoWayConnector implements a standard connector for components exchanging data in a peer-to-peer mode using standard data two-way interfaces.

    • Uses of TwoWayI in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge

      Subinterfaces of TwoWayI in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  PairedGaugeI
      The component interface PairedGaugeI defines the service of getting the last displayed value of a gauge, and it is meant to be used by another gauge that is paired with the one receiveing the request.
      Classes in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge that implement TwoWayI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PairedGaugeConnector
      The class PairedGaugeConnector implements a connector between paired gauges to allow them to exchange their displayed values.
      class  PairedGaugePort
      The class PairedGaugePort implements the port that is used to connect paired gauges to allow them to exchange their displayed values.

    • Uses of TwoWayI in fr.upmc.components.interfaces

      Subinterfaces of TwoWayI in fr.upmc.components.interfaces 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataTwoWayI
      The interface TwoWayDataI enables two components to exchange data in a peer-to-peer way, that is the two components implement the same interface and have both the sender and receiver roles.
      static interface  DataTwoWayI.PullI
      The interface TwoWayDataI.PullI contains the signature of the method that is called by one component to get data from the other component.
      static interface  DataTwoWayI.PushI
      The interface TwoWayDataI.PushI contains the signature of the method that is called by one component to send data to the other component.

    • Uses of TwoWayI in fr.upmc.components.ports

      Subinterfaces of TwoWayI in fr.upmc.components.ports 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataTwoWayPortI
      The interface DataTwoWayPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for exchanging data among components that act both as clients and service providers towards each others on the same interface.
      interface  TwoWayPortI
      The interface TwoWayPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for incoming and outgoing calls among components that act both as clients and service providers towards each others on the same interface.
      Classes in fr.upmc.components.ports that implement TwoWayI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDataTwoWayPort
      The class AbstractDataTwoWayPort partially implements a data two-way port for components exchanging data with each others in a peer-to-peer fashion.
      class  AbstractTwoWayPort
      The class AbstractTwoWayPort partially implements a two-way port for components calling each others in a peer-to-peer fashion.
      Fields in fr.upmc.components.ports declared as TwoWayI 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected TwoWayI AbstractTwoWayPort.connector
      connector used to link with the other component.
      protected TwoWayI AbstractTwoWayPort.out
      proxy used to call the other component through this port.
      Methods in fr.upmc.components.ports that return TwoWayI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TwoWayI TwoWayPortI.getOut()
      returns the proxy to be used by the owner component when calling components connected to this port.
      TwoWayI AbstractTwoWayPort.getOut() 
      Methods in fr.upmc.components.ports with parameters of type TwoWayI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TwoWayPortI.setOut(TwoWayI out)
      sets the proxy to be used by the owner component when calling components connected to this port.
      void AbstractTwoWayPort.setOut(TwoWayI out)
